spell.name: Exchange Image
entries: To mislead pursuers, the Lacunafex developed the means to swap visages. You trade appearances with the target, with the effects depending on the result of the target's Will saving throw. Willing and {@condition unconscious} targets automatically critically fail this saving throw.

entries.Success: You take on the target's appearance, and they take yours. This has the same effects as a 1st-level {@spell illusory disguise} spell, except that the target can't {@action Dismiss} the disguise. The duration is 1 minute or until Dismissed.
entries.Failure: As success, but the duration is 1 hour or until Dismissed.
entries.Critical Failure: As success, but the duration is 24 hours.

spell.name: Forgotten Lines
entries: Members of the Lacunafex and other allies use this spell to restore material that Thrune agents have redacted from historical or otherwise valuable texts. You learn one piece of information that was removed from the target text after its creation. You can instead learn one piece of information from a text that had been destroyed, but you must have a fragment of the text, such as a piece of the cover, a page, or even a clasp or metal fittings.

6: The spell reconstructs all missing information regarding a specific topic of your choice.
9: The spell also reveals information the writer self-censored and didn't commit to paper.

spell.name: Join Pasts
entries: With touches to the targets' foreheads, you bring them into mental communion. The targets can share thoughts and experiences, but not words. When one target attempts to {@action Recall Knowledge}, the other can {@action Aid} the first target's skill check, using any {@skill Lore} skill (even if that {@skill Lore} wouldn't normally apply) without having made any preparations to {@action Aid}.

1: You can touch one additional target to include them in the spell's effects. Multiple targets can attempt checks to {@action Aid} the target who is attempting to {@action Recall Knowledge}.

spell.name: Silver's Refrain
entries: The "Song of Silver" was an enchanted song used by the Silver Ravens to battle diabolic forces. You pull from select verses to temporarily replicate some of the legendary song's benefits, albeit on a much smaller scale.

Weapon and unarmed attacks by allies in the area are treated as silver. In addition, this spell automatically attempts to counteract any {@spell dimension door} cast by a devil within the area or cast by a devil attempting to enter the area using {@spell dimension door}. If a devil attempts to enter the area using {@spell dimension door} and the spell is counteracted, the devil remains where it started.

spell.name: Spiritual Anamnesis
entries: Memories of a past life that seem incredibly real (and may even be) overwhelm the target's mind. This is especially disorienting for undead and creatures that have lived a previous life (such as celestials, fiends, monitors, and many other extraplanar creatures); if such creatures roll a critical success on their save, they get a success instead, and if they roll a failure, they get a critical failure instead.

entries.Success: The creature is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} for 1 round.
entries.Failure: The target is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} for 1 minute and babbles about the visions, possibly providing information about what they saw.
entries.Critical Failure: As failure, but the target is also {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 3}.
